data.title: Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3: Release Date, Trailer, and Everything You Need to Know
data.text:
Courtesy of HBO Max

We have been waiting for The Sex Lives of College Girls season 3 for almost two years now, but the long-anticipated release is quickly approaching, and we've never been more excited for school to be back in session.

We were first introduced to Bela, Kimberly, Leighton, and Whitney — our chaotic and lovable roommate foursome — in November 2021 on the campus of Essex College, where their newfound freedom would be tested to the absolute limits. While the group wasn't necessarily interested in friendship (we're looking at you, Leighton), their odd pairing ended up being the perfect recipe for hilarious disaster, and season 2 gave us even more wholesome moments and drama between the four (now we are looking at you, Caanan).

Co-created by Mindy Kaling and Justin Noble, Sex Lives of College Girls is about stepping out on your own, exploring sex and sexuality —and the many on-campus nudist adventures — while also simultaneously building lifelong friendships with people who were once strangers. Whether you're new to the Girls of Essex or were glued to your screen throughout seasons one and two, there's no denying that the forthcoming third season of the show will be its biggest yet — and you do not want to miss out.

Luckily for you, we've collected everything we know so far about Sex Lives of College Girls season 3 below, including cast updates, plot details, and more. Keep reading or jump to a section with the arrows below.

→ Release date

→ Trailer

→ Cast

→ Plot

→ Photos

When is Sex Lives of College Girls season 3 coming out?

Though no exact release date has been announced as of yet, Sex Lives of College Girls will premiere in the fall of 2024. On August 4, 2024, the Max Original Comedy Series was included in a spot announcing HBO and Max's lineup for the last quarter of 2024 and 2025, giving fans the first peek at the upcoming season and confirming season 3 is “coming soon.”

The first teaser clip shows our core four in party mode. You can watch the clip below:

↑BACK TO TOP LIST↑BACK TO TOP LIST

Is there a trailer for Sex Lives of College Girls season 3?

At the time of writing, there is no trailer for Sex Lives of College Girls season 3 but that could change any minute now. For reference, the trailer for season 2 of Sex Lives of College Girls was released on October 19, 2022, and the series premiered on November 17, 2022.

While we wait for the season 3 trailer, you can relive some of the funniest dorm moments from season 1 below:

↑BACK TO TOP LIST↑BACK TO TOP LIST

Who will be in Sex Lives of College Girls season 3?

Season 3 of The Sex Lives of College Girls will introduce some changes for our leading four. Pauline Chalamet will return as Kimberly Finkle, Alyah Chanelle Scott will step in the shoes of Whitney Chase, and Amrit Kaur will still play the sexually liberated comedienne Bela Malhotra.

However, while Reneé Rapp will still be Leighton Murray for season 3, her role has gone from regular to recurring. Rapp is still set to appear in "a handful of episodes" of season three, but she'll be exiting the series after.

Related: Reneé Rapp Addresses Sex Lives of College Girls Departure in Farewell Letter to Fans

However, fret not because other plenty familiar and new faces will be part of season 3, like Jocelyn (played by Lauren “Lolo” Spencer), Canaan Greene (Christopher Meyer), and Lila Flores (Ilia Isorelys Paulino). Mitchell Slaggert, who joined the cast as a series regular during season 2, will also return for season 3. Other main cast members include Renika Williams as Willow and Mekki Leeper as Eric Miller. Gracie Lawrence has also joined the cast as new transfer student Kacey, as has Mia Rodgers as Taylor, a first-year international student.

The recurring cast includes Nabeel Muscatwalla as Arvind, Rebecca Wisocky as Professor Dorfmann, Michael Hsu Rosen as Brian, as well as Devin Craig, Ruby Cruz, Michael Provost, and Roby Attal as new cast additions in still undisclosed roles.

↑BACK TO TOP LIST↑BACK TO TOP LIST

What will happen during Sex Lives of College Girls season 3?

Season 2 of Sex Lives of College Girls ended with a couple of loose threads, so it's safe to assume those will be tied up when season 3 arrives. Leighton made a 180 and not only quit Kappa but also came out to her dad. Whitney broke up with Andrew. Bela got kicked out of The Foxy. Kimberly and Canaan finally hit it off, with Whitney as a witness. Aaand, of course, Bela requested to transfer to another school. Quite a lot!

While seasons 1 and 2 focused on freshman year, season 3 is expected to pick up during the sophomore year and deal with all of the hijinks of living arrangements as school starts again. Speaking to The Daily Beast, Kaur said season 3 is “a different energy” thanks to the many new characters joining the show. “[Season 3] will be that: What is it to have new energies in any circumstance that happens in college?”

↑BACK TO TOP LIST↑BACK TO TOP LIST

Are there any photos from Sex Lives of College Girls season 3?

At the time of writing, Max has yet to release any images from Sex Lives of College Girls season 3.

↑BACK TO TOP LIST↑BACK TO TOP LIST

We will keep updating this post as we learn more about The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3.
